snippet: Walmart said sales would be flat this year, and its shares sank 9 percent. JPMorgan Chase led a slide in financial stocks.
abstract: Stocks fall, dragged down by weak earnings from Walmart and lackluster data on economy.
lead_paragraph: Walmart said sales would be flat this year, and its shares sank 9 percent. JPMorgan Chase led a slide in financial stocks.

headline.main: Market Drops on Weak Results From Walmart and Big Banks
